price: 我的确担心我死后继承人的问题，我的妻子又是不会生育的，求你赏赐我一个儿子，
arabic: وَإِنِّي خِفۡتُ ٱلۡمَوَٰلِيَ مِن وَرَآءِي وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا فَهَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيّٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī khif'tu al-mawāliya min warāī wakānati im'ra-atī ʿāqiran fahab lī min ladunka waliyyan
